## Governance Change Checklist (Required)

- [ ] This change does NOT violate the Platform Constitution
- [ ] This change does NOT violate the Constitutional Stop Layer
- [ ] No new profiling, targeting, or identity sorting was introduced
- [ ] No hidden telemetry/tracking was introduced
- [ ] No admin power expansion without audits/logging
- [ ] Cross-references updated (Chain of Authority / Index)

### Summary
(What changed and why)
